list_definition.definition: a strip of material to put round something
a stripe of a colour etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Fiona was wearing a white skirt with a band of red in it.

list_definition.definition: in radio etc, a group of frequencies or wavelengths
a number of people forming a group
to unite or gather together for a purpose

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They banded together to oppose the construction of the factory.
